specialAbilities.name: Blind Senses
specialAbilities.description: The grimlock can't use its blindsight while deafened and unable to smell.

specialAbilities.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
specialAbilities.description: The grimlock has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

specialAbilities.name: Stone Camouflage
specialAbilities.description: The grimlock has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

actions.name: Spiked Bone Club
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 2 (1d4) piercing damage.
